funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by grants from the French Institute for Sustainable Development (IRD, JEAI DENCHICTHAI) and Thailand One Health University Network (THOHUN) through the United States Agency for International Development (agreement no. 017/2016), Mahidol University. This work was also publicly funded through the French National Research Agency under the "Investissements dâ€™avenir" programme with the reference ANR-16-IDEX-0006.
